problem: 如图,AB,AC为⊙O的两条弦,OD⊥AB于D,OE⊥AC于E,已知∠BOC=160°,则∠DOE=()
answer: 解:连接OA,由圆周角定理得,∠BAC=\frac{1}{2}∠BOC=80°,∵OD⊥AB,OE⊥AC,∴∠ADO=90°,∠AEO=90°,∴∠DOE=360°-90°-90°-80°=100°,故选:C．
comment: 本题考查的是圆周角定理,在同圆或等圆中,同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等,都等于这条弧所对的圆心角的一半．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, AB and AC are the two chords of ⊙O, OD ⊥ AB is in D, OE ⊥ AC is in E, it is known that ∠BOC = N_0, then ∠DOE = ()
